views.markdown:
Blocks those annoying "XXX is typing..." push notifications that Snapchat doesnt let you disable. There are no settings to configure.

This cannot and will not get you banned from Snapchat. This does not hook into Snapchat in any way. It accomplishes this by hooking the notification publisher on the phone and blocking push notifications from showing up if it comes from Snapchat and ends in the text "is typing..."

No Screenshots for this item.
